snippet: A program providing free medicines has produced a survival rate comparable to that of gay men in the United States.
abstract: Study in The New England Journal of Medicine shows HIV positive patients in Haiti who were given free antiretroviral drugs under initiative begun in 2006 have similar survival rate to counterparts in United States.
lead_paragraph: A program providing free medicines has produced a survival rate comparable to that of gay men in the United States.

headline.print_headline: AIDS Program Is Working in Haiti
headline.main: AIDS Treatment in Haiti Promising for Developing Nations
